short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Redirects AliExpress 3 from US $2.99 to item page automatically

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension skips AliExpress "3 from US $2.99" page by redirecting you to the products official page. No tracking or storage of user data, just redirecting to what you want to see.
